content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining and Transport System at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0) mining coal
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) storing coal
- Output burner inserter at (42.5, -80.5) that moves coal from chest

###Smelting Setup at position(47.0, -80.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (47.0, -80.0)
- Input burner inserter at (45.5, -80.5)
- Planned belt system between output inserter and input inserter (currently being rebuilt)

ERROR TIPS
- Ensure required items are in inventory before placement
  - Attempted to place underground belt without having any in inventory
- Entity alignment issues with furnace and inserter placement
  - Multiple attempts were made to align furnace with inserter drop position
  - Consider using a placement planning system that validates positions before placement
- Belt system blockage issues
  - Output inserter getting blocked due to no space in destination
  - Consider implementing better belt flow management

NAMESPACE

Functions:
- place_entity(): Places entities on the map
  - Failures: No item in inventory, Invalid placement position
  - Success: Entity placed at specified coordinates

Important Variables:
- position: Position (x,y coordinates)
- direction: Direction (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT)
- status: EntityStatus (WORKING, WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION, NO_INGREDIENTS, etc)
- inventory: Dict[str, int] (current items and counts)
- fuel: Dict[str, int] (fuel levels in entities)
